message: I propose dividing the money in a 70-30 ratio, with me receiving $7000 and you receiving $3000. Let me know if this works for you.
I think a 60-40 split is fairer. Let's see if we can agree on this.
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal division of the money, with both of us receiving $5000. This maintains fairness while accounting for the decrease in value of the currency.
